search_results.title: Everdred - EarthBound Wiki - Fandom
search_results.snippet: Everdred is a hustler and thief whom Ness runs into at the west side of Burglin Park in Twoson. He attacks Ness on sight, initiating combat by leaping off the ...

search_results.title: Everdred
search_results.snippet: Everdred (Japanese: トンチキ Tonchiki) full name being Al Everdred is a character in EarthBound, who is the boss of Burglin Park.

search_results.title: Everdred | Villains Wiki - Fandom
search_results.snippet: Everdred is a husky middle-aged man with a small black hat, glasses, and a mustache, as well as a permanent smile on his face which shows a row of teeth.
